_header: This sinful man said in his thought
Note: A variant version from those in 4525, 5688, and 5752.
Subjects: debates, between angels and devils; devil; sermons, verse in; translations
_description: Speeches by demons and angels at the death-bed of a tyrant — eight couplets scattered in a Latin prose sermon

CamCCC423.First Lines:
This synfull man saide yn his thoȝthis synne was lititill and
                    God he dred noȝt…
CamCCC423.Last Lines:
…Lorde of thi mercy euery man goode hope most haueIn þi
                    wynges lorde are mony mercies when þey will craue
CamCCC423.Note:
In ‘13 Sermones’ (beg. p. 159), in the sermon on
                    ‘Ambulare’ (beg. p. 275).
